Title: Silverlight Survey Application
Description: A Silverlight-based online survey system. Designed for the academic community to perform research, especially psychological research, the code can be adapted to a variety of uses.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Silverlight-based online survey system. Designed for the academic community to perform research, especially psychological research, the code can be adapted to a variety of uses.

This is a Silverlight based, academic survey tool. It allows for multiple conditions, automatically notifies participants, and allows downloading of data to Microsoft Excel. To see a sample of the application, go to http://www.modernresearch.org/ps/samples.aspx.
